_header: Christ and Saint Mary so on shamble me I-led
Subjects: Godric, saint, prayer of; prayers, of saints; songs
_description: St Godric’s prayer in Reginald’s Vita S. Godrici — a single couplet

BodLauMis413.Transcription:
Crist and Seinte Marie sio on scamel me i leddethat ic on this hi
                    erthe ne scuilde mit mine bare fot itreide

         London: Methuen, 1952: 172.

BLHar153.Transcription:
Seinte Marie sƿa me ileddethat ic on þis hi erthe ne sould
                    noth mine bare fot hi trede
BLHar153.Note: Written as prose amidst Latin prose text.

BLRoy5Fvii.Transcription:
Crist and sainte marie sƿa on scamel me ileddeþat ic on
                    þis erðe ne silde ƿid mine bare fote i tredie
BLRoy5Fvii.Note:
It appears ‘tredie’ in the second line is a miscopying for
                    ‘tredde’.
